Reviews.Title: Do not buy this phone if you want to have any apps
Reviews.Author: Heather Smith "household appliance aficionado"
Reviews.Content: This would be a great phone if it wasn't for one HUGE issue. It has almost no internal memory. In fact, it has so little memory that you can't even update the applications such as Google Maps that came pre-installed on the phone, and they can't be moved to the SD card. This is a huge problem. If you are skeptical that maybe I just don't know how to use my phone, check the online forums. Lots of people are considering getting rid of this phone because of this issue. Of course the phone still works, and it is pretty fast, and there's a lot to like about it. But having the phone constantly tell you that you are out of internal memory and have to go clear your caches and delete text messages is very annoying. I would not buy this phone again.

Reviews.Title: HTC Wildfire

Reviews.Content: This phone does not work. It drops calls and you can't get you emails. I would not wish this on my dog. That was money that I wasted. They say if buy something cheap you get what you pay for. That statement is true. I only kept this phone for three days and it sitting in the box in the closet.
